text: Hey Rane, we do have GraphQL in a small developer BETA right now. We presented on it at developer day a few weeks ago <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CbinsbfAMS0>
Feel free to fill out <https://www.HubSpot.com/devday2021/private-betas> to request access
If you were interested, I would love to hear more about your expectations as it relates to headless and HubSpot. Wanna set a time up to chat?

The HubL VSCode extension needs a lot of improvement, some things like: autocomplete (if I start typing in `get_asset` in a HubL file I would expect an autocomplete for "get_asset_url()"), and hover information for variables, functions, and filters. It would also be nice to have syntax validation when using default modules (e.g. if I use `@HubSpot/linked_image` it would let me know that `img` arg needs to be an object and that it's required).
